name: .ANA
summary: Learn about .ANA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open ANA files with Adobe Animate (multiplatform). To open an ANA file, open the Assets panel if it is not yet displayed by selecting Window â†’ Assets. Then, select Import Assets from the Assets panel.

Since ANA files are compressed with Zip compression, you can also open them with a Zip decompression utility, such as Microsoft File Explorer (Windows), Apple Archive Utility (macOS), or Corel WinZip (Windows), to extract their contents. You may need to change the .ana file extension to .zip for the utility to open it.
